custom_line_width=”50″][vc_column_text]

Free Standing Balustrades

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our Free-Standing balustrade systems are designed following the latest version of BS 6180. Live loadings are based on BS 6399 while other out-of-plane loads are based on project specifications and also American construction standards, ASTM E985 and ASTM E1300 serve also as references.

The primary elements of our balustrade consist of rolled mild steel channel (hot deep galvanized)  or Aluminium shoe brackets and laminated heat strengthened glass using PVB or SGP interlayer material as per the wind load and specification requirements.

Relying on the strength of the glass that is secured to a sturdy base rail, without any vertical supports or even a handrail, our frameless glass balustrades use thicker and heavier super-strong laminated and toughened safety glass. All our balustrade systems also undergo performance tests such as live load and impact tests that are conducted by independent testing agencies.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1631110701942{margin-top: 150px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}”]“[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627115152252{margin-top: -60px !important;padding-right: 80px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;}”]

Free-Standing frameless glass balustrades for balconies, raised decks or patio areas and rooftop terraces create an almost invisible barrier between the viewer and the view.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627115163233{margin-top: -10px !important;padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

”
